definition.text: Bitcoin Factory Programs consolidate all Governance Rewards related to the Bitcoin Factory: The Factory is an exciting approach to predict future market development by combining Advanced Data Mining and Machine Learning.

paragraphs.text: At the Bitcoin Factory, we work hard to predict the future, using a sophisticated combination of Advanced Data Mining and Machine Learning.

Doing so requires a lot of computing power - much more than a single person could afford. This is where the strength of the Superalgos Community comes into play: By crowd-sourcing computing power, we are able to continuously test, optimize and extend our prediction models.
Bitcoin Factory Programs will reward users who have contributed to these efforts with an allocation of Superalgos Tokens.

The Bitcoin Factory Programs node consolidates all Rewards Programs related to the Bitcoin Factory. At the moment, the community rewards contributions of computing power for the testing of Machine Learning models via the Computing Program. Further programs are expected to become available on an ongoing basis.
If you have contributed to testing efforts, please spawn a Computing Program node to claim your rewards.
Do you want to learn more about how to get started with the Bitcoin Factory? Check the Readme in the /Bitcoin-Factory subfolder of your Superalgos installation!
